text: (movun hæra) minisungen samaharek sitinnaha. ovun (boru prabandha kata adi) puhu puvat milata gena, (eva minisunta kiyava penva) allahge margayen, nodænuvat (janatava) margaya værada yamata salasva, eya samaccalayatada lak kara gannaha. mevænnanta avaman gena dena danduvam niyata vasayenma æta
